title: New: Jahne – Pain Body/Hindsight
body:
You’d probably know **Sam Maguire** from his **Flash Forest** moniker but you might not know that he has another project going on, the more electronic focused **Jahne**.

With a new track on the loose and with influences rooted in house and UK garage scene, **Pain Body/Handsight** is a strictly dancehall vessel that defines a unique producing style and a track just yearning to be owned on wax.
